speaker.whotheyare: Dina Zielinski brings biological data to life, from decoding mutations in cancer to encoding data in DNA.
speaker.whylisten: Dina Zielinski is a bench scientist and bioinformatician with broad experience in genetics and genomics. Her current projects are in developmental biology and neurology, but she is motivated to keep learning and using her skills to answer scientific questions that challenge our deepest knowledge.
